title: Work simplification applied to clerical operations
creator_credit: Kinocrat Films and W H Smith and Son
brief_description: How a series of typical clerical operations in an office were simplified and speeded up by watching for unnecessary strain and discomfort, and for unduly ponderous or inefficient processes, and eliminating them.
